availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Newport, Kentucky, attorney. Piermont, New Hampshire native. Married to Sarah A. Root. Father of Oliver W. Root, Albert Root, James C. Root, and Sussie Root. Attorney in Newport in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 28. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 203. New Hampshire, Births and Christenings Index, 1714-1904, Ancestry, Grafton, 1806. Find A Grave, "Ira Root (1806-1868)," Memorial #88686959, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88686959/ira-root (accessed April 18, 2017).
